actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to restore the duty that prevailed under the Tariff Schedules of the United States for certain agglomerated cork products.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a duty on agglomerated cork not further advanced than cut or molded into blocks, plates, cylinders, rolls, sheets, slabs, rods, stocks, strips, and other shapes.

titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to restore the duty that prevailed under the Tariff Schedules of the United States for certain agglomerated cork products.
